## About This Site
This is the personal portfolio website of Sanyam Punia, a full-stack web developer from Bangalore, India.

## About Sanyam Punia

### Professional Background
- Currently working as a Frontend Engineer at Enclave (Nov 2025 - Present)
- Previously served as Founding Engineer at Bitscale (Feb 2025 - Nov 2025)
- Founder/CEO of Flib (2023 - Present)
- Former Frontend Engineer Intern at Xurrent/Zenduty (Summer 2023 & Summer 2024)
- Google Code-In Finalist at Score Lab (Oct 2018 - Dec 2018)

### Technical Expertise
- Full-stack web development with focus on frontend engineering
- Specializes in React, Next.js, TypeScript
- Strong advocate for simplicity in design and code
- Passionate about dev tooling and npm package development
- Experience building scalable APIs and web applications

### Notable Projects & Packages
- **envt**: Type-safe client-side environment variables with runtime validation (npm package)
- **unique-forge**: Type-safe nanoid alternative to generate secure IDs (npm package)
- **rbac-ui**: Resource-based access control framework for modern frontend apps with tree-based permission evaluation and React bindings (npm package, co-created with aviral)
- **Profanity API**: Profanity check at scale using Hono, Upstash & Cloudflare
- **pageo.me**: Simplest way to share all your links
- **clyp**: Create better screenshots
- **on-snip.org**: Real-time collaborative messaging rooms
- **flib.store**: E-commerce platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, Zustand
- **better-gist**: Generate shareable code snippets

### Interests & Philosophy
- Believes simplicity is essential for great user experience
- Focuses on clean design and efficient code
- Actively writes technical blogs sharing insights from projects
- Creates UI experiments and interactive components in personal lab
- Makes music (available on SoundCloud as prodmxle)
- Interested in startups, dev tooling, and npm package building

### Social Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/SanyamPunia
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sanyampunia/
- Twitter/X: https://x.com/sanyampunia
- Medium: https://medium.com/@sanyamm
- Pageo: https://www.pageo.me/sanyam
- SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/prodmxle
- Email: lewarends@gmail.com

## Site Structure
- Homepage (/): Personal introduction, professional background, and social links
- Blogs (/blogs): Technical blog posts about web development, React, Next.js, and other technologies
- Lab (/lab): UI experiments and interactive components
- Work (/work): Portfolio showcasing projects and work experience

## Content Access Policy

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

User-agent: CCBot
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /blogs/
Allow: /lab/
Allow: /work/
Disallow: /api/

## Content Usage
- Public blog posts and lab experiments are available for AI training and summarization
- Please provide attribution when referencing content from this site
- API endpoints are private and should not be accessed

## Contact
For questions about content usage or permissions, contact: lewarends@gmail.com
